entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 10:41AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water On The Koyukuk River This Week... Runoff from heavy rain in the Brooks Range late last week is moving down the Koyukuk River. The crest of high water is expected to reach Hughes this evening and Huslia on Thursday. High water will likely cause erosion of the riverbank at Huslia. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:12PM AKDT by NWS
